Word counts¶

The system calculates word counts and stores this value on legal content and ADRM content as follows:

  • Only legal content that contains a body field (text articles, how-to articles, guides, and video) have word counts.

  • ADRM content only supports text fields

  • Metadata fields like titles, descriptions, etc are not included in any count.

Note

Because only legal content and ADRM content can be edited by legal aid members and are the only content types under moderation, they are the only content types currently with a word count field.
